title: WhatsApp & email for info on suspects
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Police have made available a WhatsApp number and an email address to provide information about the suspects involved in the violence that took place on the 9th of May at GotaGoGama & MynaGoGama.
Police said that the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) has launched an investigation into the incident and has released 76 photographs to identify and arrest the suspects.
Accordingly, the information can be sent via WhatsApp to the following telephone numbers.
Police further stated that information regarding the wanted suspects could be sent to the Director of the CID at dir.cid@police.lk.
